items.sentence: Tom thought that Mary was just pretending to be happy.
Tom thought that Mary would make a good bounty hunter.
Tom is running the risk of getting himself in trouble.
Tom had two pairs of skis tied to the roof of his car.
Tom is listening to messages on his answering machine.
Tom knew Mary wanted John to ask Alice not to do that.
Tom later discovered what Mary had told him was a lie.
I don\'t feel like running all the way to the station.
I don\'t have much money, but I can get along somehow.
Tom will keep doing that if someone doesn\'t stop him.
